item.title: Importing Wireguard ProtonVPN Config into NetworkManager
item.author: sam@stelfox.net (Sam Stelfox)
item.description: If you’ve tried importing a standard Wireguard config through the NetworkManager UI in recent years (such as those generated for your by ProtonVPN), chances are you’ve encountered an error message about a missing connection.id property. In the past, I’ve resorted to manually setting it up, but I wanted a more efficient solution. Luckily the issue seems limited to the GUI as the NetworkManager CLI can still import the config without issue, like so:
